channel.title: Board Nomination on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Board Nomination on FinanClub

item.title: M
item.description: score:39 Chances: Macy’s received nine nominations to its board from activist investor Arkhouse Management Co., which could potentially lead to a change in the company’s direction and strategy. The unsolicited bid from Arkhouse Management to take Macy’s private indicates a potential opportunity for the company to reevaluate its financial and operational strategies.
